title: Eppadi Vandhaayo Lyrics English Meaning
stanzas:
Thanglish English Translation

Eppadi vandhaayo..
punnagai thandhaayo
Eppadi vandhaayo..
ennai kondhaayo
How did you come here..
and give me this smile?
How did you come here..
and captivate me?
Ennangali enneramum
un yosanai thaane
Thallaamale thallaaduren
naane..

 In my thoughts,
it is only your memory at all times.
Even without being pushed,
I am stumbling.
Kannaadiyin bimbangali
naane illaye neeye
Pathaama poyaache
boomi ellaam inga		 In the reflections of the mirror,
it is not me, but you.
This whole earth here has
become insufficient.

Kannukkulla un kanava
paakka vendi
Kandadhallaam
palikkathaan vandhondi

 Just to see your dreams
within my eyes,
I've come so that everything
I've seen comes true.
Ennai pathi
innum solla thonudhadi
Ippadiye naalum poganumadi		 I feel like telling you
even more about myself,
Every day should pass just like this.
Mothamaai angunu ada..
enakku naan therinjene
Oru murai unai nerungugaiyil..
pala murai tholindhene		 Entirely there...
I finally discovered who I am.
While approaching you once...
I lost myself many times over.
